title: Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for February 2025
description: The puzzle solutions for February 2025. The post Wheel of Fortune Bonus Puzzle Answer Today for February 2025 appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Nicholas Tan
excerpt: Here is the answer to the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle today for February 2025, plus the solutions to the other puzzles in the game.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of February 2025. We will also provide answers to all of the standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily after the episode airs, so you check back throughout the month to find the latest solutions. The episodes from February 24 to February 28, 2025 don’t seem to be tied to any particular theme. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Jessica Frey, Janelle Fullford, and Ryan Smetzer. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for February 28. What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight? The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, February 28, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode. Bonus Round Puzzle – FRIGID WEATHER [Thing] Tossup #1 – A HAMSTER ON A WHEEL [Living Thing] Tossup #2 – DON’T QUOTE ME ON THAT [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #1 – LOVE IS IN THE AIR GUITAR [Before & After] Regular Puzzle #2 – I’M GOING TO NEED THOSE REPORTS ASAP [Office] Regular Puzzle #3 – SUPER-DUPER SCUBA DIVING [Fun & Games] Tossup #3 – BANK ACCOUNT [Thing] Tossup #4 – MUTUAL FUND [Thing] Tossup #5 – PIGGY BANK [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – THE ICING ON THE CAKE [Food & Drink] Fan Friday – OYSTERS And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Thursday, February 27: Bonus Round Puzzle – BEGINNING AGAIN [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #1 – SETTING A TREND [What Are You Doing?] Tossup #2 – COOL YOUR JETS [Phrase] Regular Puzzle #1 – MICROWAVING FISH AT WORK [Pet Peeve] Regular Puzzle #2 – STRAWBERRY & PAPER JAM [Same Name] Regular Puzzle #3 – BREATHTAKING NATIONAL PARKS [Places] Tossup #3 – LOVE LETTER [Thing] Tossup #4 – HEARTWARMING LETTER [Thing] Tossup #5 – CHAIN LETTER [Thing] Regular Puzzle #4 – TRAVEL WRITER [Occupation] The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the February 28 episode. The MY$TERY WEDGE $10K giveaway is also live and asks viewers to watch Wheel of Fortune and hope that someone wins $10,000 using the My$tery Round. If someone does, a special SPIN ID graphic will appear and you can check your Wheel Watchers Club account to see if your SPIN ID matches up.
html:
Here you’ll find the Wheel of Fortune bonus puzzle answer throughout the month of February 2025. We will also provide answers to all of the standard puzzles and toss-ups. We will update this article daily after the episode airs, so you check back throughout the month to find the latest solutions.

The episodes from February 24 to February 28, 2025 don’t seem to be tied to any particular theme. Hosted by Ryan Seacrest and Vanna White, tonight’s game will feature three new contestants: Jessica Frey, Janelle Fullford, and Ryan Smetzer. Here are all the solutions to the Wheel of Fortune puzzles for February 28.

What are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers tonight?

The following are the Wheel of Fortune puzzle answers for Friday, February 28, 2025 and the categories (in brackets) for each puzzle shown in tonight’s episode.

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – FRIGID WEATHER [Thing]
  • Tossup #1 – A HAMSTER ON A WHEEL [Living Thing]
  • Tossup #2 – DON’T QUOTE ME ON THAT [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – LOVE IS IN THE AIR GUITAR [Before & After]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – I’M GOING TO NEED THOSE REPORTS ASAP [Office]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – SUPER-DUPER SCUBA DIVING [Fun & Games]
  • Tossup #3 – BANK ACCOUNT [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – MUTUAL FUND [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – PIGGY BANK [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – THE ICING ON THE CAKE [Food & Drink]
  • Fan Friday – OYSTERS

And here are yesterday’s puzzle answers for Thursday, February 27:

  • Bonus Round Puzzle – BEGINNING AGAIN [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #1 – SETTING A TREND [What Are You Doing?]
  • Tossup #2 – COOL YOUR JETS [Phrase]
  • Regular Puzzle #1 – MICROWAVING FISH AT WORK [Pet Peeve]
  • Regular Puzzle #2 – STRAWBERRY & PAPER JAM [Same Name]
  • Regular Puzzle #3 – BREATHTAKING NATIONAL PARKS [Places]
  • Tossup #3 – LOVE LETTER [Thing]
  • Tossup #4 – HEARTWARMING LETTER [Thing]
  • Tossup #5 – CHAIN LETTER [Thing]
  • Regular Puzzle #4 – TRAVEL WRITER [Occupation]

The Fan Friday contest by Collette is still active and a new word for the sweepstakes will be posted at some time during the February 28 episode.

The MY$TERY WEDGE $10K giveaway is also live and asks viewers to watch Wheel of Fortune and hope that someone wins $10,000 using the My$tery Round. If someone does, a special SPIN ID graphic will appear and you can check your Wheel Watchers Club account to see if your SPIN ID matches up.
